task.summary: Default task
Added SchedType structure, added a couple of records.
Added more code for add used method modal, but errors
Added other version of nested form for used methods. Need to ensure the old method still works for subject module addition and then fix the edit view for portfolio
Fixed currency list on portfolio
Fixed dynamic lists and modded both portfolio and subject to use inplace nested fields. Need to resolve why only one nested field adding at a time for portfolio so far

Fixed add method button to be able to allow addition of multiple nested children. Had to modify helper to replace strings. Also , modified button to add new row after the last record, using the tr:last option

Modded to convert tags to links which allow them to link to index pages with subset of content based which have that tag. Need to set so that the page tells you that you are looking at a subset based on a tag.
Have just added Opinions scaffold and table to system, adding source and portfolio as potential items for opinions using polymorpic.
Have added friendly_id system for permalink slugs to Subject, Sources and Users. Need to sort out for Blog
Installed sitemap generator gem - not configured yet
Completed configuration of sitemap for both main app + blog.
Added Slug to Subject_modules to allow Friendly_id for SEF. Still need to work out a suitable page for the modules

Started modifications to store created by and updated by id for various models including portfolio, subject, source, subject_module. All tying back to User model. Opinion already has a user id reference that may be sufficient since an opinion should only be creatable and modifiable by one person.

Completed modifications to models and controllers for assignment of items based on current user - subject, portfolio, source. created_by and updated_by fields in each table. Opinions table still deemed unnecessary
Made modifications to Opinions model, views (basic) and controller to tie portfolio to opinions. Views are very limited and will have to be redesigned to improve usability
Just some basic view changes for Opinions
Started addition of portfolio to friendly id slugs. Need to figure out how to add other class fields to name definition inside class object
Modified opinions to include slugs, added title field, modified views accordingly.

Last commit after installing PostGreSql. Added to gems and converted database.yaml to point to PG DB. Had to dump from SQLite3 to a sql file, change out a number of field types to ensure compatibility, then run it on the PG database, Let's hope it works.
Last, Last commit after installing PostGreSql. This is the dump file that was used
